ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: I got mine in the upper 20 s.  Actually, I was incredibly lucky.  There were only two other people in Paw, a ranger and a cleric.  The ranger was maxxed, and
ygData.messageBody:
I got mine in the upper 20's. Actually, I was incredibly lucky. There were
only two other people in Paw, a ranger and a cleric. The ranger was maxxed,
and the cleric was his alt that he was power-leveling. He asked me if I
wanted a Kisch, and after he told me that stats, I jumped at the chance. I
invis'd and met him (and his cleric) at his spot in the open area just
outside near the first door into that old captain's area. After 2 or 3
spawns, he tells me to loot, and -=presto!=- I am Kisch'd :o) Right time,
right place.

-=B=-
35th
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Rosha Unca <captrosha@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 8:46 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions


> Going for a Kisch at 19?? All I can say is...if you pull that off,
> you are definetly Super Bard in my book!! It took me at 30ish
> something with a 50 Enchanter, 48 Paladin, and a 40ish something Mage
> to take obtain my Kisch. It's all the other gnolls in the room as
> well that make it a tough battle.
>
> Rosha Cristi, Bard of 49 {insert something muscical here}
> Innoruuk
>
> --- In eqbards@egroups.com, Elijah Meeker <emeeker@m...> wrote:
> > Thanks for all the replies folks (and keep 'em comin' *grin*
> particularly
> > any 10-20 suggestions in Kunark)
> >
> > I forgot about how much fun reavers are and how effective the
> hermit is
> > (assuming you can get the camp) and how great NK is for teenagers.
> >
> > There are some Right of Passage places I was forgetting too, like
> wisps in
> > Erud's crossing at 12.
> >
> > Oooh, and the Kisch der Pavz....gotta give it a try once I get hit
> 19 and
> > get invis.
> >
> >
> > Thanks all!
> > Tszaaz
> >
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
